original: Bergendahl, Tord Gunnar, civilingenjör, verkst. direktör, Göteborg, f. 11/6/88 i Strömstad av borgmäst. Klas B. o. Davida Lindgren. G. 26 m. Martha Lilliehöök. Barn: Gunnel f. 27, Marianne 30, Klas 32. — Stud:-ex. i Växjö 06, kompl. t. realstud:ex. v. h. real i Gbg 07, avg:ex. fr. KTH (VoV) 11. Stud:res. t. USA, Canada, Engl., Ital, Frankr., Tyskl. 19 o. 24. •Anst. s. ing. h. Södertäljekomm., ka-nalavd., 11, h. distr :chefen i mell. väg- o. vattenbyggn:distr. s. å., v. A-B Vattenbyggn :byråns komm:tekn. avd. 12-16, v. Borås stads kraftv:bygge v. Hulta 16-17, v. A-B Vattenbyggn :by-råns vattenkr :tekn. avd. 17-21, chef f. södra Sv:es statsarb., västra avd., 21-24, verkst. dir. f. A-B Geveko, A-B Gatu- o. Vägbeläggn :ämnen i Gbg sed. 25 samt f. A-B Bitumuls o. A-B Essenasfalt där sed. 30. Led. av Gbgs hand :kamm., Gbgs börssällsk., Tekn. samf.. Sv. tekn’:fören. Medl. av Ro-tarykl. o. SHT. Hobbies: jakt, seg^l-o. motorsport samt trädg :skötsel. RVO, RFinlLO, Gbgs idr:förb. GM, Kronob. 1. skytteM.
translated: Bergendahl, Tord Gunnar, MSc in Engineering, Managing Director, Gothenburg, born on June 11, 1888 in Strömstad to Mayor Klas B. and Davida Lindgren. Married to Martha Lilliehöök in 1926 with three children: Gunnel (born 1927), Marianne (born 1930), and Klas (born 1932). Passed studentexamen in Växjö in 1906, completed the realstud:examen at Hvitfeldtska läroverket in Gothenburg in 1907, and graduated from KTH (VoV) in 1911. Studied abroad in the USA, Canada, England, Italy, France, and Germany in 1919 and 1924. Employed as an assistant engineer in Södertälje municipality and canal division in 1911, district manager in central road and water construction district in the same year, municipal technical department of A-B Vattenbyggn:byrån between 1912 and 1916, Hulta's city power plant in Borås in 1916-1917, water power technical department of A-B Vattenbyggn:byrån between 1917 and 1921, southern Sweden's state work, western department from 1921 to 1924, Managing Director of A-B Geveko, A-B Gatu- o. Vägbeläggn:ämnen in Gothenburg since 1925 and A-B Bitumuls and A-B Essenasfalt there since 1930. Member of the Gothenburg Chamber of Commerce, Gothenburg Stock Exchange Society, Technical Society, and Swedish Engineering Association. Member of Rotary Club and SHT. Hobbies include hunting, sailing and motor sports, as well as gardening. Decorated as RVO and RFinlLO and also received "GBG's idr:förb. GM" and Kronob. 1. skyttM.

hasDecorations.name: Order of the Cross of Liberty, 1st Class
